actions.name: Protean
actions.description: Effect: The user changes their Types to the Type of an Attack on their Active List. This lasts for 5 Activations, or until the user has their Types changed or they gain @Affliction[fainted].

system.description: Effect: The user changes their Types to the Type of an Attack on their Active List. This lasts for 5 Activations, or until the user has their Types changed or they gain @Affliction[fainted].
